1. Implementation Steps
   1. Reconfigure light theme palette
      - Update --background, --card, --popover tokens to bright red shade
      - Adjust --foreground and related contrast tokens for readable typography
      - Confirm CSS variable naming and oklch syntax remain consistent
      - Note any downstream design tokens depending on background hue
   2. Align dependent utilities
      - Verify Tailwind bg-background usage inherits updated red tone
      - Spot-check core surface components for unintended color clashes
      - Adjust fallback colors if components hardcode prior neutrals
   3. Smoke test UI surfaces
      - Run app locally to confirm global background renders bright red
      - Check key routes for contrast and accessibility regressions
      - Capture screenshot for ticket verification if required

2. Files
   - Created: none
   - Modified:
     - src/styles/globals.css (≈49-116) – update light theme color tokens

3. Impact Assessment
   - Breaking changes: Potential readability issues on light theme surfaces until contrast tuned

   - Unchanged functionality: Routing, data flows, and component structure operate as before
